modName: Scarlet Dawn Armor - Conversion for HDT body with Bodyslide 2 sliders set - TBBP and more
summary:
Scarlet Dawn Armor Conversion for "HDT body" with Bodyslide 2 sliders set.
TBBP + plus belly bone weight.
descriptionHtml:
Hi,
Here is My first contribution for the Nexus.
I made a conversion of the beautiful Scarlet Dawn Armor by jmenaru for the "HDT body" (google it my friend, it's not on nexus), it add TBBP and belly bone on the armor meshes.

If you want to adapt the meshes (armor form) to your "HDT body", you need to use the sliderset in the download, to adapt to your character preset. With bodyslide 2.

*** Update to v3 new preset in bodyslide is ScarletDawn3 ***

Original mod is needed :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50814/?]Original mod[/url]
All requirements of HTD Body are needed.


Little exemple:
[youtube]B8DBJzucfDs[/youtube]
author: kalhohan

files.name: ScarletDawn htd body - bodyslide sliderset v3
